locutie.beschrijving: The preacher describes the humiliation of Christ, the historical context of mockery (minstrel shows), the Roman ritual of crucifixion, and the contrast between the soldiers' scarlet robe and Christ's 'own clothes'.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: Strong narrative exegesis; uses historical-critical insights (Barclay, Cicero) to heighten the pathos of the text.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting historical and moral truths, transitioning into a call for self-examination, and concluding with a declaration of the sufficiency of the cross.
voorbeelden: The Master moved toward his death on our behalf.
Godlessness is what is wrong with America.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To evoke shame for 'sham religion' and comfort through the finished work of Christ.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Implicit; the Spirit is not explicitly invoked as the agent of the word's power.

voorbeelden: The Roman ritual of condemnation and execution was fixed.
There is a lot of sham religion in this country.
Jesus in his own clothes going to Calvary did his best.
Shall we not shout his name?
It chills the spirit to think of the Son of God...
I am not far enough from the experience of that mockery...
The year of my redeemed is come.
He has made us his own people forever.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Moderate; promises are often framed as past-tense facts rather than present-tense bonds.

voorbeelden: The crooked way has been made straight.
declaratieven.autoriteit: High; the preacher uses the 'It is all right' as a performative word of absolution.

indicatoren: Extensive historical descriptions of Roman whips.
Long sociological commentary on American godlessness.
Talking 'about' the soldiers' actions for over half the text.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes a spectator of a historical drama rather than a participant in a current event.

performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer may feel the weight of the 'sham' but lacks a specific 'Toezegging' (Promise) to grasp.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: Strong but late. The 'It is all right now' functions as the primary promise.
voorbeelden: The year of my redeemed is come.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Personal anecdotes (the dog, minstrel shows) and self-reflection.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Challenging the hearer ('Have I put fake garments...?', 'Did you do your best?').
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used mostly for interrogation/directives rather than promises.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Describing Jesus, the soldiers, and 'the people'.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a historical distance that requires a 'bridge' to the present.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: Moralizing about America and sham religion.

actueel_present.gebruik: The final 'It is all right now'.

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: Assertive (Godlessness in America) -> Directive (Turn to the Lord).
voorbeelden: Godlessness is what is wrong... until we turn to the Lord, it will not get better.
foutief_patroon.probleem: Moralistic pressure without the preceding declarative of grace.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Assertive (Christ at Calvary) -> Declarative (It is all right) -> Directive (Arise and shine).
voorbeelden: He died in his own clothes as Savior... It is all right now... we may arise and shine.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: Very high in the conclusion, but late in the sermon.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: The crooked way has been made straight; we may arise and shine.
voorbeelden_slechte_verhouding: Did you do your best? (Asked before the declaration of grace is fully landed).

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon moves from a heavy constative surplus (history and social critique) to a powerful performative conclusion that declares the work of Christ finished.

sterke_punten.effect: Breaks the tension of the sermon with a sacramental 'event' of peace.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The long description of the Roman whip (lead and bone).
zwakke_punten.probleem: Graphic detail can objectify the suffering, making it a 'fact' to observe rather than an 'act' for the hearer.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: The sermon becomes an 'event' in the final three paragraphs where the language shifts from 'talking about' to 'proclaiming to'.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The preacher acts as a mandatory of the 'It is all right' message, though much of the sermon is spent on moral/historical preparation.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Partially; God speaks through the quoted Isaiah and Revelation texts.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Yes, especially in the repetition of 'It is all right'.
tekstueel_bewijs: And he answers, 'I have trodden the winepress alone...'

pneumatologie.geest_rol_erkend: Low; the Spirit is not mentioned.
pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Implicit; the preacher expects the hearer to 'want to do better' upon seeing Christ.
tekstueel_bewijs: When we see him... we want to do better.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Yes, in the final section where the word 'puts away sin'.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Strong in the eschatological vision of the 'other clothes'.
tekstueel_bewijs: His raiment will outshine the sun.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Shift from past-tense 'was' to present-tense 'is' earlier in the sermon.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: Jesus moved toward his death on our behalf.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Jesus moves toward this cross for you today.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from historical report to present-tense address.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The 'Toezegging' is buried at the very end.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Interweave the 'It is all right' throughout the descriptions of mockery.
voorbeeldzinnen: Even as they mock him, he is securing your peace.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Use 'we' and 'you' to bridge the gap between the barracks and the pew.
voorbeeldzinnen: We are the ones who put the scarlet robe on him.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The balance is actually quite good in the final movement.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Ensure the 'Did you do your best?' question is clearly answered by 'He did his best for you'.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A powerful narrative sermon that successfully escapes a constative surplus in its final act, achieving a truly performative, sacramental conclusion.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SAT focuses on the 'It is all right' as a reality-changing declaration, whereas SvT would focus on the preacher's 'self-revelation' about his dog.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The power here is not in the vividness of the whip (rhetoric) but in the authority of the promise (SAT).
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that the sermon's 'event' status is saved by the shift to Commissive/Declarative verbs in the final 200 words.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: Godlessness is what is wrong with America.

appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the 'indicative' of Christ's suffering to prepare for the 'declarative' of his victory.
